trans-unit.source: Add compatibility for plone.app.testing for Python 3. [icemac]

trans-unit.source: Add javascript / css include support to WSGIResolver.
trans-unit.target: Ajouter le javascript/css pour inclure le support de WSGIResolver.

trans-unit.source: Add support for @if-not-path.
trans-unit.target: Ajouter le support pour @if-not-path.

trans-unit.source: Add support for Python 3.8 [pbauer] (#77)
trans-unit.target: 增加对Python 3.8的支持 [pbauer](#77)

trans-unit.source: Allow attributes (i.e. xml:id) to pass through on drop @attribute nodes [lentinj]
trans-unit.target: Autoriser les attributs (c'est-à-dire xml:id)à passer sur les nœuds drop @attribute [lentinj]

trans-unit.source: Allow inline content for after and before. [ebrehault, elro]
trans-unit.target: 允许内联内容为后和前。[ebrehault,elro]

trans-unit.source: Allowed content-to-content inclusion. [elro, ebrehault]
trans-unit.target: 允许从内容到内容的纳入。[Elro,ebrehault]

trans-unit.source: Also evaluate if-not-content. However, we are at risk of replicating apply-conditions.xsl in it’s entirety. this needs refactoring. [lentinj]
trans-unit.target: 还评估if-not-content。但是，我们有整体复制apply-conditions.xsl的风险。这需要重构。[lentinj]

trans-unit.source: Also evaluate merged-condition. This means a rule tag will turn red when a condition on an outer rules tag doesn’t match. [lentinj]
trans-unit.target: 还评估合并条件。这意味着当外部规则标签上的条件不匹配时，规则标签将变为红色。[lentinj]

trans-unit.source: Avoid a ResourceWarning. [gforcada] (#75)
trans-unit.target: 避免资源警告。[gforcada](#75)

trans-unit.source: Bug fixes:
trans-unit.target: 错误修复。

trans-unit.source: Changelog
trans-unit.target: 变更日志

trans-unit.source: Code Cleanup and enforcing Code Conversions [loechel]
trans-unit.target: 代码清理和执行代码转换[loechel]

trans-unit.source: Debugging output. [lentinj]
trans-unit.target: Débogage de la sortie.[lentinj]

trans-unit.source: Diazo - We Write XSLT, So You Don’t Have To
trans-unit.target: 重氮-我们编写XSLT，因此您不必

trans-unit.source: Diazo allows you to apply a theme contained in a static HTML web page to a dynamic website created using any server-side technology. With Diazo, you can take an HTML wireframe created by a web designer and turn it into a theme for your favourite CMS, redesign the user interface of a legacy web application without even having access to the original source code, or build a unified user experience across multiple disparate systems, all in a matter of hours, not weeks.
trans-unit.target: Diazo允许您将静态HTML网页中的主题应用到使用任何服务器端技术创建的动态网站中。有了Diazo,您可以将网页设计师创建的HTML线框转化为您最喜爱的CMS主题,重新设计遗留网络应用的用户界面,甚至无需访问原始源代码,或者在多个不同系统中构建统一的用户体验,所有这些都只需要几个小时,而不是几个星期。

trans-unit.source: Diazo implements a Deliverance like language using a pure XSLT engine. With Diazo, you "compile" your theme and ruleset in one step, then use a superfast/simple transform on each request thereafter. Alternatively, compile your theme during development, check it into version control, and not touch Diazo during deployment.
trans-unit.target: Diazo使用纯XSLT引擎实现了类似Deliverance的语言。使用Diazo,你可以一步到位地 "编译 "你的主题和规则集,然后在此后的每个请求中使用超快/简单的转换。或者,在开发过程中编译你的主题,检查它的版本控制,并在部署过程中不接触Diazo。

trans-unit.source: Don’t close the response unless Diazo is transforming it. [mitchellrj]
trans-unit.target: 除非Diazo正在转换它，否则不要关闭该响应。[mitchellrj]

trans-unit.source: Drop support for Python 3.4. No code changes. [maurits] (#78)
trans-unit.target: 放弃对Python 3.4的支持。不修改代码。[maurits](#78)

trans-unit.source: Escape curly brackets on theme attributes. [TracyWebTech]
trans-unit.target: Echappez aux parenthèses bouclées sur les attributs du thème.[TracyWebTech]

trans-unit.source: Extend cssselect instead of using experimental.cssselect [elro]
trans-unit.target: 扩展cssselect,而不是使用experimental.cssselect [elro]

trans-unit.source: Fix
trans-unit.target: 修复

trans-unit.source: Fix diazo.debug console with Python 2.7. [pbauer]
trans-unit.target: 修正 Python 2.7 的 diazo.debug 控制台。[pbauer]

trans-unit.source: Fix packaging error. [esteele]
trans-unit.target: 修复包装错误。[esteele]

trans-unit.target: 修正webob 1.7的测试 [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Fix unicode errors in tests [petschki]
trans-unit.target: 修正测试中的unicode错误[petschki]。

trans-unit.source: Fixed issue with remote themes via https connections [loechel]
trans-unit.target: 修正了通过https连接远程主题的问题 [loechel]

trans-unit.source: Fixed to not apply absolute prefix for relative urls starting with ‘#’. [datakurre]
trans-unit.target: 固定为对以“＃”开头的相对网址不应用绝对前缀。[数据库]

trans-unit.source: For detailed documentation, please see diazo.org.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细文档，请访问diazo.org。

trans-unit.source: Handle error when serializing empty responses by returning an unthemed response. Previously, empty text/html responses resulted in an raised exception, resulting in a 500 response and no output. [davidjb]
trans-unit.target: Gérer l'erreur lors de la sérialisation des réponses vides en renvoyant une réponse non traitée.Auparavant,les réponses vides de type texte/html entraînaient une exception levée,ce qui donnait une réponse de 500 et aucune sortie.[davidjb]

trans-unit.source: Make flake8 happy by moving imports to top of file. [elro]
trans-unit.target: 把导入文件移到文件的顶部,让flake8满意。[elro]

trans-unit.source: Make tox env release check manifest before releasing [loechel]
trans-unit.target: 在释放[loechel]之前,先检查ox env释放清单。

trans-unit.target: 新特点:

trans-unit.target: 新的。

trans-unit.source: Output contents of error log as part of debugging output [lentinj]

trans-unit.source: Preserve resolvers in the rules document when updating from an old namespace.
trans-unit.target: Préservez les résolveurs dans le document des règles lors de la mise à jour à partir d'un ancien espace de noms.

trans-unit.source: Provide the request’s query string as the
trans-unit.target: 提供请求的查询字符串作为

trans-unit.source: Python 3 support. [regebro, elro]
trans-unit.target: 支持Python 3。[regebro,elro]

trans-unit.source: Refactoring if WSGI middleware to use WebOb better and fix corner cases.
trans-unit.target: Refonte du middleware WSGI pour mieux utiliser WebOb et corriger les cas de figure.

trans-unit.source: Remove any xml:lang attribute from content to prevent multiple xml:lang attributes when the html tag’s attributes are copied. [danjacka]
trans-unit.target: 从内容中删除任何xml：lang属性，以防止在复制html标记的属性时出现多个xml：lang属性。[danjacka]

trans-unit.source: Support selectors matching multiple elements for merge attributes, e.g.
trans-unit.target: Prendre en charge les sélecteurs correspondant à plusieurs éléments pour les attributs de fusion,par exemple

trans-unit.source: Use formencode’s xml_compare method to compare test results. This solves test failures on several systems. [timo]
trans-unit.target: 使用formencode的xml_compare方法比较测试结果。这样可以解决多个系统上的测试失败。[提摩]

trans-unit.source: Use same xpath prefix for css:if-not-content and css:if-content.
trans-unit.target: Utilisez le même préfixe xpath pour css:if-not-content et css:if-content.

trans-unit.source: When using Diazo, you will work with syntax and concepts familiar from working with HTML and CSS. And by allowing you seamlessly integrate XSLT into your rule files, Diazo makes common cases simple and complex requirements possible.
trans-unit.target: 当使用Diazo时,你将使用从HTML和CSS工作中熟悉的语法和概念。并且通过允许您将XSLT无缝集成到您的规则文件中,Diazo使常见的情况变得简单,复杂的要求也成为可能。

trans-unit.source: only add absolute prefix for xlink:href attributes if url doesn’t start with a ‘#’ (use anchor_safe_urljoin) [huubbouma]
trans-unit.target: 仅在网址不是以“＃”开头的情况下，才为xlink：href属性添加绝对前缀（使用anchor_safe_urljoin）[huubbouma]

trans-unit.target: request.host

trans-unit.source: use boolean(), not count() for if-content. Otherwise we generate expressions like “count(nodeset and other_nodeset)”, which aren’t valid. [lentinj]
trans-unit.target: 使用boolean（）代替if-content的count（）。否则，我们将生成无效的表达式，如“ count（nodeset and other_nodeset）”。[lentinj]

trans-unit.target: à utiliser dans le fichier de règles.[davidjb]
